name: Virus Clicker
description:
Hello everyone! This is my very first game i ever made, so please be easy on me. I chosed clicker genre because i m not good at drawing (and you will see this =) ). It was a really fun experience, i will try my best at the next mini jam as well! 

This game was made in contest Mini Jam 10 -Micro-

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-10-micro-

Theme: Micro

Limitations: 2 colors per sprite
